triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: MetaGPT is built on top of LLM capabilities to enable multi-agent collaboration.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper enhances the multi-agent system paradigm with more structured workflows and SOPs.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the cascading hallucinations problem that occurs in naive chaining of LLMs.

triples.name: Assembly line
triples.relevance: MetaGPT applies assembly line methodology as a novel paradigm for assigning roles and decomposing tasks among agents.

triples.name: Software engineering
triples.relevance: The paper benchmarks MetaGPT on collaborative software engineering tasks as the primary application domain.
